lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley plans to hire several hundred traders over the next few years to boost its underperforming securities business, the chief executive, James Gorman, said in an interview with The Financial Times.
snippet: Morgan Stanley plans to hire several hundred traders over the next few years to boost its underperforming securities business, chief executive James Gorman said in an interview with The Financial Times.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Said to Plan Hiring Traders

abstract: Morgan Stanley plans to hire several hundred traders over the next few years to boost its underperforming securities business, chief executive James Gorman said in an interview with The Financial Times.
